bug.author: agrichron
bug.summary: some pictures become invalid after i labeled them
bug.description:
i meet some problems that some pictures become invalid after i label this picture such as the following picture. thanks very much!
OS: windows10 labelimg_version: windows_v
1.3.0
PyQt version:

comments.comment: Hi @Lasper2016 , I cannot see the images. Does all of your images have the same problem or only that image?

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/tzutalin>@tzutalin</denchmark-link> The image become invalid like following . <denchmark-link:https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/20119271/26030286/b280133a-3881-11e7-8008-f8bfad27bb99.jpg></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/20119271/26030317/a072ee14-3882-11e7-94db-f0c6969f86a4.jpg></denchmark-link>
only some images in my labeled image.For example, i have labeled about 300 ,and then i found there are about 30 images become invalid. i donnot know why i cannot upload the invalid images .
I believe that this has since been resolved.
